options.text: To group code and reuse it without retyping

Testing once at the very end

Information you leave online that people can see

options.text: Public: everyone sees it; Private: only chosen people see it
The right to creative work; using it without permission is stealing

options.text: Sending hurtful messages online; it can hurt people deeply

5-electives-computer-science-block-based.prompt: What does a nested loop do?

options.text: Reduces repetition, improves readability, makes code reusable

5-electives-computer-science-block-based.prompt: What is an edge case in testing?

options.text: Extreme or unusual inputs like empty lists, zero, or maximum values

options.text: Always; they reveal bugs regular tests miss
